text:
Trait Anger Scale



A number of statements which people have used to describe themselves are given below. Read each statement and indicate how you generally feel by selecting the appropriate response option
4. l get angry when slowed down by others' mistakes...
5. I feel annoyed when not given recognition for going good work...
7. I say nasty things when mad...
8. It makes me furious when I am criticised in front of others...
9. I feel like hitting someone when frustrated...
10. I feel infuriated when I do a good job and get a poor evaluation...
